unnormalised: Electoral reforms are crucial for a vibrant democracy like India. Strengthening the Election Commission of India is paramount. Addressing issues of voter apathy, perhaps through incentivization, deserves attention. The Verma Committee's recommendations still hold relevance. Campaign finance transparency must be improved to level the playing field. Let's ensure every vote counts, reflecting the true spirit of Onam, a festival of equality. More needs to be done in J&K as well.
